name: A lot of Elevator Action
description:
A lot of Elevator Action is a 2D endless runner action game.  Fight enemies that are coming towards you and avoid incoming elevators to obtain the highest score possible!

The game is inspired by the video game Elevator Action, and the artist Kazimir Malevich with simple shapes and a limit on the colours utilised.

Clear the most meters and get the most kills to get the best score!

Controls

Keyboard Controls -

  • W - Move Up
  • S - Move Down
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Mouse Click - Shoot
  • Mouse Rotation - Rotates Gun

Mouse Controls -

  • Mouse Sroll Wheel Up - Move Up
  • Mouse Scroll Wheel Down - Move Down
  • Right Mouse Click- Jump
  • Left Mouse Click - Shoot
  • Mouse Rotation - Rotates Gun
